QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT CAST(RIGHT(Member_ID, LEN(Member_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS person_id, CAST(RIGHT(Claim_ID, LEN(Claim_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS visit_occurrence_id, Date_of_procedure AS procedure_date, CASE WHEN Type_of_claim = 'Outpatient' THEN 32859 ELSE 32853 END AS procedure_type_concept_id, CAST('1' || RIGHT(medical_facility_id, LEN(medical_facility_id) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS associated_provider_id, ICD9CM_level1 AS procedure_source_value, p.standardized_procedure_code, actual_point * 10 AS total_paid, number_of_times * 10 * procedure_standard_point as total_charge, 44818592 as CurrencyConceptId, ch.PartitionId FROM {sc}."procedure" p JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND p.Member_ID = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE JOIN {sc}.procedure_master pm on p.standardized_procedure_code = pm.standardized_procedure_code and p.standardized_procedure_version = pm.standardized_procedure_version order by ch.PartitionId, CAST(RIGHT(Member_ID, LEN(Member_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT)
